syntax macro and extend translat a translat approach is describwhich allow on to extend the syntax and semant ofa given high level base languag by the us ofa new formal call a syntax macro syntax macro definstring transform base on syntact element of the base languagtwo type of macro ar discuss and exampl ar givenof their us the condit gener of macro base onoption and altern recogn by the scan
